name: Gaea (PixeYSL)
description:
Intended submission for Great Spring Game Jam 2021. Unfortunately, I missed the time.

Gaea is a side-scroller where you revive nature along your path. Collect rain, seeds and poop to cross obstacles!

Controls:
  • A,D - move
  • Space - jump
  • E - interact
Disclaimer:

It is a very short game as this is my second project and I was struggling to execute my ideas :D
